sentences.en: A lot of small businesses went broke in the recession.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退的时候许多小企业都破产了。

sentences.en: An unruly mob broke down police barricades and stormed the courtroom.
sentences.cn: 一伙暴徒捣毁了警察设置的路障冲进法庭。

sentences.en: As they started up again, the horse broke into a brisk trot.
sentences.cn: 当他们又重新骑上马时，马突然轻快地小跑起来。

sentences.en: Communal violence broke out in different parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 在该国不同的地区发生了群体暴力事件。

sentences.en: He sustained serious neck injuries after he broke someone's fall.
sentences.cn: 有人坠落压在他身上，致使他颈部受重伤。

sentences.en: I believe in the maxim "if it ain't broke, don't fix it".
sentences.cn: 我相信这样一条箴言：“不破不修”。

sentences.en: I broke away from him and rushed out into the hall.
sentences.cn: 我挣脱了他，冲进了大厅。

sentences.en: I was in a nightclub in Brixton and a fight broke out.
sentences.cn: 当时我在布里克斯顿的一家夜总会里，那里发生了一场斗殴。

sentences.en: I'm broke, Livy, and I owe a couple of million dollars.
sentences.cn: 我破产了，莉薇，而且我欠了几百万美元的债。

sentences.en: I’m fed up with being broke all the time.
sentences.cn: 我受够了老是身无分文。

sentences.en: Most of the occupants had left before the fire broke out.
sentences.cn: 大部分住户在火灾发生前就已经离开。

sentences.en: The moment she was out of sight she broke into a run.
sentences.cn: 她一走出众人的视线就开始飞奔起来。

sentences.en: The seal on the box broke when it fell from its hiding-place.
sentences.cn: 盒子从隐藏处掉落时，封口裂开了。

sentences.en: They broke free and made off in a stolen car.
sentences.cn: 他们挣脱后开着一辆偷来的车逃之夭夭。

sentences.en: Two years later he is flat broke and on the dole.
sentences.cn: 两年后，他一贫如洗，靠失业救济金生活。

sentences.en: Weir broke his leg in a freak accident playing golf.
sentences.cn: 韦尔因为一次打高尔夫时发生的离奇事故折断了腿。

sentences.en: When war broke out, he was interned as an enemy alien.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发时，他作为敌国人士遭到关押。

words.tran_cn: 易碎的东西，易破的东西
折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）
打破，弄破；中断；弄坏；削弱

phrases.tran_cn: 爆发（火灾，战争等爆发）；被提拔职务

trans.tran_cn: 破碎，弄坏，坏掉（break的过去式）
